> Analysis of voting intention for the 2015 elections

The aim of this project is to analyze voting intention based on two surveys conducted in Buenos Aires and Córdoba ahead of the *Open, Simultaneous, and Mandatory Primaries (PASO)* held on August 9, 2015. This work was developed for the course *Applied Electoral and Public Opinion Research I & II* within the Master’s program in Statistical Information Generation and Analysis (UNTREF).
